5.title: De papierversnipperaar
5.plot: Semmie is nervous about her first real day of work and immediately makes a mistake. Akkie wants to get back to work, but Corrie won't hear of it. Steef makes a blunder with property developer Meulenbelt's architect. Sjon has difficulty juggling his own family, work and extended family. Steef asks Sjon for help collecting a payment; whatever would Akkie think about that...

6.title: Nichten en potten
6.plot: Mike and Semmie go for a day in the countryside with their friends. Mike is jealous of Semmie's boss. Steef asks Sjon for help, he finally gives in. Which puts him in a difficult position. Steef goes out for dinner with Sasha, Meulenbelt's architect. But Robert warns him, she might try to get him into bed ...

7.title: Een goed huwelijk is hard werken
7.plot: Robert wonders whether the lesbian architect might also want children ... Karen decides to change the baby's room after all. Akkie thinks Mike should start looking for a place of his own. Semmie wants to move in together, but does Mike? Corrie tries to cheer Akkie up. Is Sjon able to withstand Louise's flirting?

8.title: Een baby en een kinderwens
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: De homohaters
9.plot: Thanks to his paternity leave, Sjon is able to work full time for 'Nachtegaal en zonen' and attracts all kinds of new business; Akkie is afraid that this could be detrimental to quality of their work. Mike doesn't know whether to stay at FC Utrecht. Karen has doubts about the way she is raising baby Wouter. Corrie reassures her. Robert is harassed on the street. And responds in an unexpected way ...

10.title: De huilbaby
10.plot: Robert has to appear in court. Mike trains hard because he has heard he will be playing. But will he? Wouter cries a lot, so Karen doesn't get much sleep and asks her mother for help. Sacha feels guilty and might have some work for Bricks & Mortar. Semmie's boss takes a photo of her in a compromising situation. What are his motives?

11.title: Tekenbevoegdheid
11.plot: Sjon wants power of attorney on behalf of the company. A water pipe has burst, and Akkie is supposed to fix it ... The relationship between Karen's parents comes under even more pressure. Karen seeks solace with stay-at-home dad Erik-Jan. Semmie and Mike attempt a reconciliation. Sjon has a run-in with De Stille. While doing his community service, Robert meets the youths he attacked ...

12.title: De wedstrijd!
12.plot: It's the big day: Mike is going to play. Akkie gives him some advice. After the game, Mike has a very strange encounter in the dressing room... The Van Amerongen family's Sunday brunch is interrupted. When Robert brings his unexpected friend Patrick to see the Nachtegaal family, Steef wonders exactly what kind of relationship Robert has with the youth.

13.title: De aanranding
13.plot: Akkie is still angry with Mike because he discovered that Mike was thinking about leaving FC Utrecht. Karen and Sjon hardly have any time for one another now that he is working two jobs. Karen has a date with Erik-Jan. Steef confesses to Mike that he has been unfaithful. Akkie increasingly feels like a stranger in his own company. Corrie and Mike try to cheer him up. Semmie has to work late, and her boss is not as nice as he seems ...

14.title: Het hockeymeisje
14.plot: Semmie is being sexually intimidated by her boss. Steef tells Robert about his deceit. Mike goes out for a drink with hockey girl Pom. They have a really nice time ... Karen discovers why Erik-Jan was so interested in her... Sjon wonders whether the company can actually carry out all the orders he has won ... Corrie gets through to Akkie.

15.title: De foto
15.plot: Steef tells Corrie that Robert left. There are problems with the work they are doing for Sjon's old professor. Semmie is being blackmailed by her boss. Mike's interaction with Pom is having a positive effect on his football. Semmie and Pom meet. Karen does something nice for Corrie.

16.title: De Polen die geen Polen waren
16.plot: Sjon doesn't want Karen to involve the children in her new-found faith. Akkie worries about the penalty clause in the contract with Sjon's old professor. To make matters worse, there are problems with the Polish workers. Things become more serious between Mike and Pom. He takes her to see Karen and Sjon. Then Semmie unexpectedly turns up at a training session ...

17.title: Naar de camping
17.plot: Akkie has disappeared. Semmie helps Corrie search for him. He has finally finished with Semmie, but is this what Mike really wants? It starts to look like Sjon has been overly ambitious with his plans for Bricks & Mortar. And just as things are getting better between Steef and Robert, Steef's one-night-stand turns up on the doorstep ...

18.title: De mannen van bertje
18.plot: Corrie wants Akkie to come home. But Akkie is having fun at the campsite, with Gregory. But then Gregory's life is turned upside-down. Semmie wants to leave her job, but comes across some suspicious circumstances and postpones her decision. Robert and Steef face a dilemma: what to do about Monique's pregnancy? Sjon has called in the help of Bertje T. to finish the work on time, but it all goes wrong. Is this the end of Bricks & Mortar?

19.title: Het studentenfeestje
19.plot:

20.title: De barbecue
20.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Akkie vraagt om hulp
21.plot: The relationship between Puck and Karen comes under pressure when Karen reveals she has cancer. Karen seeks support from Corrie. Monique is gradually taking over Steef and Robert's house. Jan de Lange threatens Semmie. More and more problems are cropping up at Nachtegaal as they can't pay any workers and the jobs are not finished. Sjon, Steef and Akkie do everything they can to save the business ...

22.title: Bouwen tegen de klok
22.plot: Everyone is working flat out to save the company. Sometimes, help comes from unexpected quarters. Karen has to go to the hospital for her operation, but will it save her? Robert desperately tries to keep Monique quiet about the pregnancy. Semmie's investigation into Jan de Lange and Bertje T.'s shady business puts her in a sticky situation ...

23.title: Het huwelijk deel 1
23.plot: Semmie and Mike are preparing for their wedding. Semmie's wedding dress gets dirty. Where can she still find another dress? Mike is tested by Pom. Sjon has doubts about the future. The company seems to have been saved, but Bertje T still has an ace up his sleeve

24.title: De bruiloft, deel 2
24.plot: Mike and Semmie get married. Robert and Sjon have an argument about Karen's cancer treatment. Steef and Robert tell Corrie that Monique is pregnant. Bertje T comes to disrupt the wedding and claim the company. Will the Nachtegaals be able to fend them off? Sjon gets a shock when he sees Karen lying on the bed. She's not ...?

production companies.name: Nijenhuis & de Levita Film & TV B.V.
